:py:mod:`main`
==============

.. py:module:: main


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: abspath
   

   Abs path of the script file.


.. py:data:: dname
   

   Abs path of the directory where the script is in.


.. py:data:: args
   

   Arguments to the script.


.. py:data:: min_overlaps
   

   Dictionary with minimum overlaps for particular types of SVs.


.. py:data:: X_vector
   

   X vector.


.. py:data:: Y_vector
   

   Y vector.


.. py:data:: samples_folder
   

   File where the samples are stored..


.. py:data:: output_folder
   

   Output folder of the algorithm.


.. py:data:: folders
   

   List of folders for each sample.


.. py:data:: samples
   

   List of samples.


.. py:data:: callers
   

   List of SV callers.


.. py:data:: sample_dir
   

   Directory of particular sample.


.. py:data:: X_preprocessed_vector
   

   Preprocessed X vector.
